ygData.subject: RE: Bard Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh man he is a badass, hits for dbl 120 s and is really fast. We fought him twice along with 2 or 3 Zols. All he dropped those times was the Tunic. Thanks for
ygData.messageBody:
Oh man he is a badass, hits for dbl 120's and is really fast. We fought him
twice along with 2 or 3 Zols. All he dropped those times was the Tunic.
Thanks for the info we were going to ignore him from now on because the
Mithril tunic just wasnt that good.

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 10:54 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Weapons


From: jhenders@...

On Wed, Aug 18/99, "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...> wrote:
> From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
>
> Where does the Runed Falchion come from, what are its stats, is it
wieldable
> in either hand?

Comes from the Froglok Crusader on the live side of Lower Guk. He's in
the same tower as the cleric that drops the silvered plate greaves.
